title: Didn't Get My Mystery Champ
body: Title. I linked my account to facebook and participated in the pool party event but I haven't unlocked my mystery champ. I've checked online and others have unlocked theirs. What gives?

replies.body:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/ByvUQ776-pool-party-rewards-distribution-on-going

This thread will get updated when the rollout is complete, if you still don't have it by then consider contacting support.
It's now 7:10pm and I still have yet to receive mine, I submitted a ticket to support 4 hours ago asking why it is taking so long and still have yet to receive a repsonse.

I linked my account and still havnt gotten my free champ... I connected to facebook and havnt been reported... and its annoying me cuz everyone else has their champ.. rito plz.. y u do dis {{item:3070}}

5pm is the cutoff. So if you haven't got it by then, send a support ticket in.

> Make sure to connect from 16:59 PM AEST on 29/06 through 16:59 PM AEST on 30/06, otherwise you may not receive your Mystery Champion as expected. **We plan to ship out the Mystery Champions by 16:59 AEST on 02/07.** 

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/last-day-how-unlock-your-mystery-champion
Some are slower than others, might take all day. I got mine though
